name: Church & Dwight Co., Inc.
description: Church & Dwight Co., Inc. is a leading consumer goods company that specializes in the manufacture and marketing of a variety of household, personal care, and specialty products. Founded in 1846, the company is known for its commitment to quality and innovation. Church & Dwight operates under several well-known brands, including Arm & Hammer, Trojan, OxiClean, and more. The company's product portfolio spans across several categories, including laundry detergents, oral care, personal care products, and dietary supplements, making it a staple in households around the world. With a focus on sustainability, Church & Dwight is continuously working to reduce its environmental footprint through responsible sourcing, eco-friendly packaging, and efficient manufacturing processes. The company has a strong presence in North America and is actively expanding its reach in international markets. Its strategic acquisitions and product innovations have enabled Church & Dwight to maintain a competitive edge in the consumer goods sector. The company’s mission is not only to enhance the quality of life for consumers but also to contribute positively to the communities it serves.
